item.title: Pay
item.description: alright. If what you’re going through Man if this is your story. Bring it forth right. Symmetry is not our friend tonight.

item.description: What??? How did I get here???? Ruffled feather. This is all nonsense.

item.description: orange bread Strange dreads She speaks to me

item.title: Your
item.description: stand proud Impermanence Is ray-bound.

item.title: Time
item.description: Here I am The king of my own very canal. A thought Impulse. A derision. Cloudy thoughts. Enter the mindtrain. The purity of extra thought. Loud and clear. An extra ear. Of yours. No way are you here. No way. Strike my hand. Will it bleed. Surface cut. If there is a problem here, I … Chasm of pronouncement. There’s this angle. And this image. And then… A great thought over here.

item.title: Land
item.description: Will be times. Many times in my life. Where I will simply tone out. Zone out. It’s as if I’m the bell. And the window. It’s as if this is it. This is all I have. And then I’m called back. A blink. A mystery. A challenge. And then it all seems so foolish. Second guessing. Neighborhooding. Bringing back the last days. Some days. These days. It’s not here. You wish.

item.title: Sand
item.description: A cool effervescence Of some sort. Don’t do what you do. Do what you do. To me, There are two forces in life, There’s the reptile And there’s the Space Angel === The art of these two warring fractions Is you. What does it mean To be free? A free man. Last time I checked. There are lots of definitions of free. We’re not gonna get there, are we? Someone over here says… Sin virtue and vice.

item.title: Splash
item.description: Shamanic blessings Surprises The king’s court arises.

item.title: Grid
item.description: in her wet den of twisted charm My soul breathes awake Hallow echo.

item.title: Plain
item.description: I saw it. No. You had it wrong. You can slay something. And you can love something. It’s not the same, Gentlemen. Can we go back to ground zero. What is this hero’s business anyways? Consciousness? Ego? OK. Once there was this Dragon. It lived in its nest. A far-reaching cliff of sorts. Now this Dragon was very natural In how it behaved. It flew the skies of paradise. High brow.

item.title: Lake
item.description: Scorpish scales Descend Appropriately. We contend.

item.title: Line
item.description: Sting serpentine ritual High accord She sung to me Her song. I uh just form here. And then. Magic happen. In this space. Where we were once. Proud and Independent. Without the aid of others. Spiral happenstance. A dance. Mm. Wings unfurl. On the outset.-ide. Oh, you want me to finish this sentence? Well, I have been known to plow forth. To break the seal Of a sacrifice. It’s a big deal.

item.title: Toy
item.description: I watched those crows. I watched that fog. Those signs… Pointed one way.

item.title: Zen
Brace
item.description: The Warrior sits upright With his sword belted Tightly. He brings his chest to bare. Something of a precious artifact. The swinging Indian scout drops over his stout log A bit of a fog. Over the horizon there’s a Message from the cul-de-sac. The Warrior. Grasps his handle. Darkened wisp of candle. He clings. Nightly. "Shouldn’t your majesty be. Twisting a different message?" The swinging Indian scout. Laughs wildly. The others are just.

item.title: Fall
item.description: On your laughter. It is bliss. But do cover that.

item.title: Nine
item.description: Speak in code. I’m your bro. Circle your braids. They are beautiful.

item.title: Crack
item.description: Check one check two. They comin’ for you. Check it thrice. Gawd damn. Sir, that’s not very nice. Cup the hands. Now. Straight up. Saw that action. Fire fire. No pants here. If there were, Well, The dashes and mashes. Goodness gracious. Can you imagine? We can. Our crew can. And we do. What’s it to you? Back and forth. See-saw. It’s a bit of a mystery Like fire. Once it catches.

item.title: Curl
item.description: Seriously. Why is sex so weird. No way will it meet strange. Ever.

item.description: Your infection is a Badge. I will draw it

item.title: Last
item.description: If it’s offered Fill the coffers. Her smile lost me. The twins have a lovely mistress.

item.description: A time Awkward placement. emotional disrupt. Disruptured rapture. Blinded lines.

item.description: What’s this about? Really. All I know. You broke a 20.

item.description: Reject me. Be with me. Your son. Has. Curious behavior.

item.description: Wings pressed on Sweat and dew. She is in love.

item.description: Stumbling lords Of pawned mascots Psychic clans clamor.

item.title: Say
item.description: Let’s walk over this tripwire. It’s a finewire. Superfire. Dancestep. Aged regret. Don’t talk yet. Moon dance. Hunted stance. Wolves in the background. And by our side. Simple outlets. Forced blocks. Don’t knock. Home base. Troubled base. A friend of who’s friend? On this battleground. It might be sound. But. I don’t get it. Ya, me too. Why would I keep you closer. If you’re my brother. And all that jazz.

item.title: Dot
item.description: Hands off the mothership. Are you ready to commit This ritual or what? In.

item.title: Hub
item.description: Fuck children. Let’s get twisted And run through Ikea.

item.title: Lo
item.description: Something happened. Before it pretenseed. Super yawning. That’s right… magic. Let’s not change the super charged. SUPER CALIFLOWERPRELIOUS Since you asked. Jesuits wished they had the same. Precedence as this. It’s a matter. Of listening To the sky wishing it were shy. And then a mishmash. Supper. Eggs and cheese. Q wish you were me. From so far away? We’re done here. Yay then. Meet and then Meat too. Sausage and chicken.

item.title: Tell
item.description: Well that’s a game. And this one too. I have a friend. But uh, you , Certainly ask a lot of quest9

item.title: Clear
item.description: Soul soaked in disarray Blinding sunstream Staked through Broken vision

item.title: Ton
item.description: Yo dawg I was watching this fly right In my room And it just straight up gave me an Ego Butt To let me know who’s dawg, yo. Alright ok… let’s step away from that one for just a second. I sort of set things up in just.\ Up. Quadrants. If you please. Um. Um Um. Yum Yum Yum. Tum tum tum. Yes? Huh? Huh? Ok. Let’s get right into this shading business.

item.title: Tense
item.description: It is a troubled sport How will you recollect Your deepest memory?

item.title: Trap
item.description: Who is your favorite Teammate? a friend descends.

item.title: Troup
item.description: Dream of your hero. And then you know. The secret songs. Hallowed flow.

item.title: Cope
item.description: Something mightily going on with this Virgo business. and then the rest of us. We might pee on another man’s teepee? Let’s just get that one out of the way. There’s a predisposition to attend. You know. Like the kind you used to. Some might consider it… Who are these “some” ? Are they the new “They?” … How did you sleep last night? Quite mightily I must say. Was it assisted?

item.title: Drive
item.description: Secrets are fun. Secrets in this one. There’s a certain. Rope. A dope. Sucka. Played. And now you. On the sidewalk. Cheek against Steel and concrete. Messy barriers. I’m sure they won’t Be harassing us no more. If you cut a tree in two? What will it do? Will it dance? Prance? .. I know the answer to this one. Look outside your window. Will you? Seriously. Check it out.

item.title: Cap
item.description: What if your honesty Led to nobility Your presence has No place for her.

item.title: Dust
item.description: I’ve made it At what cost. Indignant. Cemetery.

item.title: Fly
item.description: We have placed lungs Breathed air No despair. VP bio.

item.title: Found
item.description: I would dip into the underground. To be flu.

item.title: Space
item.description: Indian giver. Marry her. God I miss her face. And body. Grace.

item.title: Star
item.description: What is life? It’s inside of you. Where’s the door?

item.title: Sum
item.description: One time. Two time. Precious energ7.

item.title: Tough
item.description: Secret bloodlines Steal her laugh time. She squeals. Secret peels.

item.title: Tow
item.description: Dark whores. Creepy vaginas. Trepid markstains. Supple gameday.

item.title: Trip
item.description: Starry entrance I’ve stripped her mind Memories of that one time.

item.description: Your message Makes my brain Hang out of my sausage. Second quadrant.

item.description: Sycophant Would you place Your miscreant.

item.title: Arc
item.description: Shifting angles Dancing principles. A certain birdie knows Your deepest shows

item.title: Bounce
item.description: You might read me. I’ve read a plenty. There’s heartache. Within. Trees.

item.title: Drum
item.description: You like Hard strike Maybe she Will let you be.

item.title: Lie
item.description: Infinity Trust aplenty She has brown eyes Something says tryst .

item.title: Pound
item.description: Something stakes me Relieves me. Cupboard basket. Cake smash it.

item.title: Tall
item.description: Sister’s keeper. Principle matters. Namesake. Place date. Your sake.

item.title: Truth
item.description: Not glory Woman Not woman God

item.title: Want
item.description: Unlocking me Unlocks your eyes Disguise those ugly Questions.

item.title: War
item.description: Who brought How taught. Something simple. Complex pimple. Aced face.

item.title: Price
item.description: To be removed from the tit Of any legacy. It’s not something we take lightly.

item.title: Test
item.description: What does it mean to take a knee? Will you watch it with me? There’s a deeper meaning in Everything that we do. A correspondence. A coalescence. When you sit there. And test the boundaries of others. There’s a certain prospect. Of rejection. When this rejection becomes part of you. You stand upon a pedestal of Perspective. When this perspective has sat upon you. You know your place. Now then, Let us continue?

item.title: Brook
item.description: Twisted twilight Spiral cemetery. Release your mind. Now you’re into me.

item.title: Hair
item.description: Dangling bride of eyes Pressing danger Staffed leer She doesn’t know Bangs of fear

item.title: Haze
item.description: In our damp labyrinth: Strange creatures Burrowed Fire Stirred Soul

item.title: Meek
item.description: It’s a candy cane forest Of death and mist Coated lullabyes Singing west

item.title: Whip
item.description: Where’s the sky? It’s your twisted might. A slight game. Where’s the muse of Your plastered right.

item.title: Nick
item.description: Littleindaaaaaaaaaaaaan chief. Let’s be brief. There’s a certain. Perspective. Some would say they miss you. Under some tissue. And if that tissue is you? Would you presumpuouptuous new? Now now see? These parts. You’ve never seen. These are some children. Mistresses. Something. Become of this? It’s this code. You might see, Once twice? Want to see more? FUCK YOUR SICOMORE TREE!! YOU WANT THIS PRESENCE??? Child please. Present your Bissom belly.

item.title: Pass
item.description: I touch the mindstream. I feel the chaos. I peel your fervor. I am your velvet. Trickle.

item.title: Twice
item.description: Pouted mouth suckles Loaded metal Dagger. Make it come baby. Too late. Gray wake.

item.title: Once
item.description: She’s happiest When’s she’s weightless Drifting into gray Depths. Heartless laughter. Tribal disaster.

item.title: Grime
item.description: Shaking paw. High desire. Her noted palace. Mire. Notes and color. Introduction and mayhem. It’s a feud of mother. Father. Let’s battle this brother. To the Technicolor.

item.title: Mow
item.description: Her soul is desolate. Her angel is a liquid slate. Here and now. A placement of soul Shifting Netherlands. She has the key as Her sword. I watch Her weep brightly, foreword. And then her. – her dagger runs deep in dreamscape I awake in a bloody escape. Where does her slithering organ end? Not a friend. Here everything is below board. Soaring before. And now Not so clear. Some fear in those crystal

item.title: Shred
item.description: She sits with me Full tilt as the sidewalk Melts between us Dirty devils steal one of us She’s a sidearm And her arm is a Bandolier Of crazy years Some say She dissipates Crazy 8’s Oh no stay away She has this mighty fine stack Of powder Wouldn’t want to be Her But I know I know I’ll be on On that porch soon Kicking off my shoes. She dances blind within

item.title: Shake
item.description: A caged animal. Markings on the floor Indicate A separate subsidy Of consolidation. Friends. A plenty. The evidence suggests Brutal undertakings Of a swift investment Only to be turned over Into a long-term contingent. Separately, there seems to be a motion Of an activity /// where was we? There’s something of a phenomena with this process. Maybe you get this. You have your first thought. And then there’s a second. And then another.

item.title: Speck
item.description: She descends In winged dominance Over barren waters My fear is entranced Holy reverberations Mountains quiver. High-winged creatures clap Distanced, they circle Her air. Time caves in my space She cups my broken waste. I am packed meat in Her crusted cocoon. I cry Her wasted tear. Blue sky above and near. Salted demons dance On thirsted tongue. And now, in Her rigid rock-womb A bloody song is rung. Ears bleed forth I’ve lost sight of Her sun.

item.title: Arc
item.description: Step Four. Nothing more. Nothing less. Universe can be explained to you. To me. Your answer is your key. It’s simple. Masterpiece. A matter of relativity. You hold in your hands this matter. It’s a silver platter. Subject to respect Circumspection Restoration. Your spirit holds The inseminated images Of cinema. Unfolding your mind In a myriad of different fathoms. A bird’s beak is a delicate name, madam. In this Scorpio’s nest, a Brother brings his best.

item.title: Snow
item.description: Second step. Let’s place me and you In your shoes. What do you choose? Child You are a foster Fire. In this space. Time for this Party To be a tardy prostitute. Dare I solute. To your mighty Promiscuous ways. But, darling please. What does Prometheus weigh? You might kiss to begin. But this breakfast has already committed sin. The stars in your eyes. Much obliged. Hold and Grant your authorship.

item.title: Pour
item.description: Cousins of Dionysus Dance your might Around the centered pole Eerie delight The ground swallows your Magicians and sorcerers whole. The troubled elves gasp They laugh inside Back around and around Skip those feet Marching beat. The pole grows wider Your blood runs in cider. Human drama binds/runs the casting spell Dwelling gnomes Double-shaking shoulders Dusted tomes Thick ash smolders Grasping collective Threads of spiraling glee We dance with me. She prances heartache with them.

item.title: Air
item.description: What is this life I lead. Is it a disease. A second ease. Slowly. Slowly. Patience is a virtue. Yes. Have I made a monster out of this? A rubbing of the chaos. First step. Let us begin. It’s something of an underbelly. A fatboy in disguise. Running after his demise. He wishes his wisdom Buried in broken tides. There are spirits in these Trees. Not just you. Not just me.

item.title: Saint
item.description: Do you here pronounce these hands To enjoy The placement of space and time. To embrace the holy remembrance Of the Holy white. To Eat the air. To feel the prenumbrance Of You. Together. United. Let’s watch both of you dance Unto the Holy Lights. Let us place you in A Mighty Delight. Be Blessed and Welcomed To Our Kindred. Bringing you in our heed. A supple steed. Let us all pronounce you Light unto All.

item.title: Whale
item.description: A little refresher course for all you numerologists out there. Who’s to blame? All eyes on me. If you please. It’s a delegation. Predilection. It’s a workshop. Post-mop. Operation. A post-mortem. A mirror on the wall. Watch those who are watching you. And you’ll see. It’s a sea. Of bluegrass. Simple glass. Brotherhood. Misunderstood. Malfunction. Sister break. Let’s watch these words we share. It’s imperative. We declare. Simpleton. Singleton. It might be whiskey.

item.title: Out
item.description: And how you would just stir In that twilight haze That backlight painted my mind With soft expression Of your lost soul My hand would stare up at you Awaiting our first dance And I would lay back and watch you Fire your pyre around me And this place I somehow wonder if I will ever carry in that essence And if your story will ever find its break Our jagged spirits would just mesh As rusted gears I would stare at the ceiling And listen to your feet swim In ecstasy We were children of your tears

item.title: Bout
item.description: She dances in front of me. And I sing her praises. I watch her wail and tail. She is my goddess. She has fire and might. Completing sight. If you just see the way She breathes To me. And I in turn ignite Her forthright I’ve never seen a better dance I would never give this up No other swimmer in my cup I am the drummer to her pup Such plain expression Delightful children Spiritual premise DANCE CHILD!

item.title: vIEW
item.description: How do I start this. Let us depart this. It’s a supple reality Full of fruits and authority. Can you not take this precious dance Too far. Encased in tar. Embarrassment too far? Let’s take a step back and review. Some view this Extraordinary behavior what does it take to make a band Of three. Might take me. Thee Some authority. AND WHEN YOU PRESS Regress. A gentle neck There’s a certain story here I’m sure it’s in the clear.

item.title: Slump
item.description: Sway sway The sands sprinkle Underneath Beige foothold arcing Rounded mounds Flowing sparks of joy Dissipating bliss breeds Grand visions The warrior arises from his Caged gluttony Gaia’s subtle song Whispering flesh In ear and mind bones A conduit of peaceful pairings Beneath these grains and above In one Encompassing Ray The warrior knows the dance To this song His feet yield The mighty blisters At Her Holy Command Sand kicks high Prepare the beast

item.title: Bright
item.description: Here I am Dancing in the wilderness. This secret is clutched in my grasps. I swing wildly with my right foot. I pound slightly with my left foot. They each sing the others’ praise. The dust swirls with such high regard. The long tail of wind directs beige perspective. A mound forms beneath, To the side, And on the top of its side, A cacophonoph approaches I find the right swings under me, The left swoops in front.

item.title: Sun
item.description: I want to see your thick Unapology. I want to see your best In me. Supple. Lying. In this dark bliss. The caverness. Of unyielding. Wastedness. Your eyes. In candlelight. Remind me. Of stricken gold light. And that bracelet. So unforetold. The glimmering diamond. Can I be so bold? I wish your Cadaver. Could be examined. Placed in abandon. To dance with. And holding tight. Abounding might. When you see me.

item.title: Wood
item.description: When I walk her at 2AM. I feel at peace. In harmony. I resonate. When I walk her at 3AM. I am a paper sentinel. With a paper sword. When I walk her at 4AM. Her dew dresses my garment. I am at one. With this animal. We ride. I sing her discord. I wave her glee. And down her concrete stakes and wooden slabs. Along her many miles of pressed visions.

item.title: Sharp
item.description: When she closes her Mind’s eye She forgets her past. And everything. Caught in a twisted dream. I account for Her. It’s a broken mindset. But broken things Are meant to be fixed. Shifted asylum. Her heart is astray A wicked wonder. Hearing her voice again. Handshake left, and right. Are we in your crew? A crew of risk. Typing desk. Her eyes hold the sunlight Of a million moons. It’s a click on that door.

item.title: Gloss
item.description: When I go into the depths of those Eyes It is like a mist And there’s this hum In my head. There’s this brilliance. A dancing Sun. And I touch her skin. Just wanting to win. Somewhere in this Darkened Dance room. Her hips Roam with mine. Entwined. Dangerously. She tells me it’s a new day We’ll wait and see. She compliments me. Heavily. A tear to my eye. I won’t deny.

item.title: Float
item.description: You there! Little alien creature. Tell me what we’re here for. Hear for. And then. Maybe I’ll listen. Take a gander. Of your mission. What you’re wishin’. Because, I am Like you. Just spacin’ out. Without a doubt. Trippin’. Wanderin’ Hopin’ we’re headin’ in the right. Direction. And when we don’t. We don’t shout. We don’t pout. We pontificate. In your doubt. Wishin’ we were on that road. To nowhere. Something beautiful.

item.title: Be
item.description: Truth be told Strangely Unique. She sleeps beneath my wings. Under this rock. Protectorate. Beneath my underworld. Gathering the impending storm. So dark. So vivid. It gathers. Gathering. Like woodwork. I stare at it. Like it’s an image. Stolen from my soul. These beats in my head. I wonder where they storm from. Is it honest to steal their Meaning? Sometimes. I feel I Speak in Circles. So Let’s pick an angle And get this party Started.

item.title: Seem
item.description: Her circles run coarse Around me. Coating me with Her Liquid cold fire I embrace Her Counted Shimmering blessings I pick Her favorite dance She follows. Leading Her into my circle. I pronounce Her Alive Ignited In Her ring Of flickering chaos. Wonder. I find Her bliss. She Smiles. Deep. One step too far. Never said. Never stated. She whispers selective patterns. I listen. But. The angle of my motioned feet.

item.title: Pounce
item.description: She has these Starborne eyes. And I Here. on her blackened scarred beach. Face down. Spit the sand out my mouth. What happened? Where is she now? Standing over me. With that smile. And I wonder. What it meant. Don’t leave, Scorp. We need you. I. Need. You. II. Win this Holy Game. Under your covers. Left bare. The secret moment of your Life’s scare. I see your pattern. I know your fate.
